docker-basics/docker-architecture.title: 🏗️ Docker Architecture
docker-basics/docker-architecture.description: Understanding Docker's architecture is crucial for mastering containerization. Let's explore how Docker works under the hood.

docker-basics/what-is-docker.title: 🐳 What is Docker?
docker-basics/what-is-docker.description: Docker is a platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers. Think of containers as lightweight, portable packages that contain everything needed to run an application.

docker-networking/docker-networking-basi.title: 🌐 01. Docker Networking Basics
docker-networking/docker-networking-basi.description: Docker networking allows containers to communicate with each other, the host machine, and the external internet. This comprehensive guide covers everything you need to know about Docker networking.

docker-volumes/docker-volumes-basics.title: 📦 01. Docker Volumes Basics
docker-volumes/docker-volumes-basics.description: Docker volumes provide persistent storage that survives container restarts and can be shared between containers. This comprehensive guide covers everything you need to know about Docker volumes.

dockerfiles/dockerfile-basics.title: 📝 Dockerfile Basics
dockerfiles/dockerfile-basics.description: A Dockerfile is a text file that contains instructions for building a Docker image. It's like a recipe that tells Docker how to create your application's environment.

intro.title: 🚀 Welcome to Docker Complete Guide
intro.description: Welcome to the most comprehensive Docker documentation on the web! This guide will take you from Docker basics to advanced orchestration, covering everything you need to know to become a Docker expert.
